import React from 'react'; const About = () => { return (

About Me

I'm a passionate Cloud Systems Engineer and DevOps Engineer specializing in building and maintaining scalable, cost-effective cloud infrastructure. I excel at automating complex deployment processes and optimizing cloud spending across AWS environments.

With expertise in Infrastructure as Code (Terraform), container orchestration (Kubernetes), and comprehensive monitoring solutions (Dynatrace), I help organizations streamline their operations while maintaining high availability and performance standards.

My focus areas include CI/CD pipeline automation with GitHub Actions, database management and optimization, business intelligence with Tableau, and implementing cost optimization strategies that have helped organizations reduce AWS spending by up to 40%.

); }; export default About;
